text:
<@U24DCSJBE> Hi Shay, thanks for following up.
I just sent tests of the same emails that were having the broken image issue and they're showing up correctly in Gmail now woo! Maybe the internal fix the internal HubSpot dev teams made took additional time to populate across all portals? Either way, glad its working now.
Thanks for the insight about the rich text blocks as well.
We had some troubles with images in emails, but were able to resolve most of them by uploading better sized / higher res images.  If we have any issues we can't resolve through that method or the `?noresize` parameter, we'll reach out to support. Good to know about the image resampling engine, excited to test it out.

So, am I crazy in thinking that I remember cloning the original drag-n-drop email footer to make a custom version? For some reason I can no longer see the original module file in my design manager files and I  feel like I'm going insane
